Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Controller for handling user authentication and registration operations. Manages login, password changes, and company representative registration. Follows MVC pattern by separating business logic from presentation. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on UserCsvHandler abstraction.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Field Details

    • userRegistry

      private final UserRegistry userRegistry
      The user registry containing all registered users

    • userCsvHandler

      private final UserCsvHandler userCsvHandler
      CSV handler for user persistence operations

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController(UserRegistry userRegistry, UserCsvHandler userCsvHandler)
      Constructs a LoginController with the specified user registry and CSV handler. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle - depends on abstraction, not concretion.
      Parameters:
      userRegistry - The registry managing all user accounts
      userCsvHandler - The CSV handler for user persistence operations

    • LoginController

      public LoginController(UserRegistry userRegistry)
      Constructs a LoginController with the specified user registry. Uses singleton UserCsvHandler for backward compatibility.
      Parameters:
      userRegistry - The registry managing all user accounts

  • Method Details

    • getFormattedProfile

      public String getFormattedProfile(User user)
      Get formatted profile string for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose profile to format
      Returns:
      formatted profile string

    • authenticateAndGetProfile

      public String authenticateAndGetProfile(String userID, String password)
      Authenticate user and get profile - returns profile string for MVC compliance
      Parameters:
      userID - User ID
      password - Password
      Returns:
      Formatted profile string

    • authenticate

      public User authenticate(String userID, String password)
      Authenticate user - returns User object (used internally and by ViewFactory).
      Parameters:
      userID - the user's unique identifier
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      authenticated User object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if credentials are invalid or account not approved

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String userID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password after verifying the old password.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user's unique identifier
      oldPassword - the current password for verification
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Returns:
      true if password changed successfully
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user not found or old password incorrect

    • registerCompanyRepresentative

      public boolean registerCompanyRepresentative(String email, String name, String password, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Registers a new company representative account.
      Parameters:
      email - the representative's email (used as user ID)
      name - the representative's name
      password - the account password
      companyName - the company name
      department - the department within the company
      position - the representative's job position
      Returns:
      true if registration successful
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if email invalid or already exists

    • userExists

      public boolean userExists(String userID)
      Check if user exists by ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID to check
      Returns:
      true if user exists, false otherwise

    • findUserById

      public User findUserById(String userID)
      Find user by ID - reusable method for other controllers.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID to search for
      Returns:
      the User object if found, null otherwise

    • getAllCompanyReps

      public List<CompanyRepresentative> getAllCompanyReps()
      Get all company representatives - for StaffController.
      Returns:
      list of all company representatives

    • approveRejectCompanyRep

      public void approveRejectCompanyRep(String repID, boolean approve)
      Approve/reject company representative - for StaffController.
      Parameters:
      repID - the company representative ID
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
